name: Fire
description: Aggressive elemental focused on burning through enemy defenses. Excels at removing problematic blocks.

name: Water
description: Defensive elemental with board control abilities. Strengthens blocks to dominate flip battles.

name: Forest
description: Growth-focused elemental that strengthens over time. Spawns additional blocks to control zones.

name: Ice
description: Control-focused elemental that freezes opponents. Locks down key positions to prevent counter-plays.
